VoiceList.Entry: “Cloud's coming!”
“You think he wants to come in?”
Tifa “Was that the first day you came into my room?”
Tifa “…that's right.”
“We lived next to each other.”
“But I really didn't know you that well.”
Tifa “I've known you since we were children and always thought we were close…”
Tifa “That's right…”
“I…really didn't know Cloud that well.”
“That's why I was a bit surprised when Cloud asked me to come out to the well.”
“Tifa was so popular and I never played much with the others…”
Tifa “But,but listen! After Cloud left town, I thought about him a lot.”
Tifa “I thought,I wonder how Cloud is doing?”
“I wondered if he was able to get into SOLDIER?”
“I even started reading the newspaper, just to see if Cloud was in any of the articles.”
Tifa “I want…to see…Mom…”
Tifa “But,but listen! After Cloud left town, I thought about him a lot.”
Tifa “I thought,I wonder how Cloud is doing?”
“I wondered if he was able to get into SOLDIER?”
“I even started reading the newspaper, just to see if Cloud was in any of the articles.”
“Don't worry about me,Tifa”
“Tell this guy later. He'll probably be happy.”
